text: Maram asigidamak matam pumnamakta eikhoina nakhoigidamak haijei. Mahakna hingnanaba koukhiba punsi aduda nakhoibu matik chaba oihannaba eikhoina Tengban Mapuda haijei. Mahakna nakhoina touba pamba aphaba pumnamak adu mahakki panggalgi mapalna thunghanbinaba amadi nakhoigi thajabagi thabak adu mapung phahanbiba oisanu.
